title: Inter Miami defeat Vancouver Whitecaps in MLS Cup final – as it happened
summary: Inter Miami triumphed over the Vancouver Whitecaps in the MLS Cup final. The match showcased Miami's skill and determination. Beau Dure provided commentary on the event.

title: Inter Miami claim MLS Cup as Messi inspires tight win over Vancouver
summary: Inter Miami secured a historic 2-1 victory over Vancouver in the MLS Cup final, concluding an impressive 58-match season. Lionel Messi played a pivotal role, contributing to both goals in the match. This marks a significant achievement for the team in its inaugural season.

title: Mohamed Salah says ‘I’ve been thrown under the bus’ and signals Liverpool exit
summary: Mohamed Salah expressed a broken relationship with coach Arne Slot after being benched during Liverpool's draw with Leeds. He indicated that his future at the club is uncertain, suggesting that a match against Brighton could potentially be his last. The situation highlights ongoing tensions within the team.

title: Strictly Come Dancing: week 11 – as it happened
summary: Musicals Week featured a new Dance Relay and concluded with Paddington's ballroom debut. Amber Davies secured the top spot, while Karen Carney landed at the bottom. The competition heats up as contenders prepare for the penultimate dance-off.
